Package org.spongepowered.api.data.type

Interface JigsawBlockOrientation

All Superinterfaces:
Comparable<JigsawBlockOrientation>, DefaultedRegistryValue, StringRepresentable
@CatalogedBy(JigsawBlockOrientations.class) public interface JigsawBlockOrientation extends DefaultedRegistryValue, Comparable<JigsawBlockOrientation>, StringRepresentable
Represents the front and top orientation of BlockTypes.JIGSAW blocks.
